note: Marine Scientist with 60 years underwater experience of coral reef ecology. Cruising the South Pacific aboard the research vessel Moira since 1976 doing independent research on evolution and then investigating methods of changing community behavior to minimize damage to coastal ecosystems as Tellus Consultants. Producer of the Rocket Cruising Guides to New Caledonia and Vanuatu.
